--- select_tablesample_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:    11,
      Source: &parser.TableName{
        Table: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  18,
          end:  25,
          Name: "Singers",
        },
        Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
        As:   &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   26,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  29,
            end:  30,
            Name: "S",
          },
        },
        Sample: &parser.TableSample{
          pos:    31,
          Method: "BERNOULLI",
          Size:   &parser.TableSampleSize{
            pos:   53,
            end:   65,
            Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
              pos:   54,
              end:   56,
              Base:  10,
              Value: "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS S TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
